trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dieppe
There were no other sightings in Dieppe on or around December 18th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAt first I thought it was an airplane because we live close to an airport. 12:40PM , we were driving home from the shopping center when I noticed a very shiny aluminum looking in color object which seemed to be an airplane taking off from the airport , it was about 200yards in front of us and about 300ft in the air. I was watching it when it seemed to turn in the other direction it was heading west and looked like it turned to the south when I thought I was looking at the back of it I could see a tiny star like light and then it just disappeared. It was a clear day and my wife was with me but I didn't tell her about it when i saw it because I thought it was just an airplane. anyways im sure it wasn't an airplane, because they dont just disappear.
